name: Name
regulation: The rules below define whether an order qualifies for a specific offer

description.title: Customize Offer Message
description.helperText: Message to be used when the customer qualifies for the offer
description.label: Add Message

promotionText.label: Promotion Message
promotionText.helperText: Message to be used in the offer description for the customer

usage.title: Usage Quantity
usage.subtitle: Allows defining a maximum or range of usage quantity for the offer to apply to the order

quantity_orders.title: Order Quantity
quantity_orders.subtitle: Allows defining a maximum or range of order quantity for the offer to apply

amount.title: Amounts
amount.subtitle: Allows defining a maximum or range of amount for the offer to apply

amountCategory.title: Amounts by Category
amountCategory.subtitle: Allows defining a maximum or range of amount by category for the offer to apply

product.title: Products
product.subtitle: Allows selecting the product(s) that can be added to the order under a specific offer

category.title: Categories
category.subtitle: Allows defining one or more categories to which a specific offer can be applied

address.title: Address
address.subtitle: Allows defining one or more locations where a specific offer can be applied

orderCountByTime.title: Order Count in a Time Interval
orderCountByTime.subtitle: Allows defining an order count in a time interval for the offer to apply.

amountSpentByTime.title: Total Amount Spent in a Time Interval
amountSpentByTime.subtitle: Allows defining a maximum amount spent in a time interval for the offer to apply.

longevity.title: Customer Longevity on the Platform
longevity.subtitle: Allows defining a time unit to which a specific offer can be applied.

specificClientList.title: Specific List of Eligible Clients
specificClientList.subtitle: Allows defining a list of clients eligible for a specific offer.

product.min: You must add a product-type rule

variant.required: A variant from the list must be selected

address.min: At least one address must be added

category.min: You must add a category-type rule
category.min-1: At least one category must be added
